title: By the Queene the Queenes Maiestie, hearing credibly by report, that in some partes of her realme, her people and subiectes are, and of late have ben vexed and molested, by certayne lewde persons vnder pretence of executing commissions for inquiries to be made for lands concealed ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publicationStmtPlace: Imprinted at London in Powles Churchyarde :
publicationStmtPublisher: By Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
